summary: Dashboard application with authentication, clean UI featuring Deep Onyx (#050505) background with Emerald (#10b981) accents, control panel toggles, active plan display, telemetry feed, and team status
architectural_notes: Deep Onyx (#050505) background with Emerald (#10b981) accent colors throughout UI
Bento-style card layout for main dashboard components
Lucide icon library standardized across application

existing_features.title: Restore the original sidebar and main content spacing from the 'Nishant' dashboard version with Deep Onyx (#050505) background and Emerald (#10b981) accents
Display a clean and prominent 'Welcome back' header at the top of the dashboard
Create a Control Panel card in bento style with toggles for Neural Shield and Stealth Mode that log toggle actions to the telemetry feed
Add an Active Plan card displaying 'Sovereign Enterprise' as a badge with a Log Out button positioned nearby
Implement a compact scrolling Telemetry Feed on the right side of the dashboard displaying logged events
Add a Team Status card showing a simple list of active users
Maintain localStorage authentication logic where AXON_SESSION existence determines dashboard vs Sign-In display
Ensure Log Out button clears AXON_SESSION from localStorage and redirects user to Sign-In page
Configure Neural Scan transition to play only once upon successful login, not on subsequent page loads
Remove all redundant logos and Initializing screens from the dashboard interface
Standardize all dashboard icons to use the Lucide icon set with Emerald (#10b981) color

new_feature_requests.summary: Restore original clean, high-density dashboard UI with sidebar and main content spacing
Integrate Control Panel with Neural Shield and Stealth Mode toggles that log to feed
Add Active Plan card showing 'Sovereign Enterprise' with Log Out button
Implement compact scrolling Telemetry Feed on the right side
Add Team Status card showing list of active users
Maintain localStorage authentication logic with AXON_SESSION
Ensure Log Out clears session and returns to Sign-In
Neural Scan transition plays only once upon successful login
Remove redundant logos and Initializing screens
Standardize all icons to Lucide icon set in Emerald color
